description:
Werewolves, cat girls, and dragons. It’s a bit much for Hitomi to take in as she finds herself on the planet known as Gaea. Before she can get comfortable, invisible enemies attack the kingdom, and she must entrust her life to King Van and Escaflowne.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Mädchen vom Mond der Illusionen
La fille de la lune des illusions
The Girl from the Mystic Moon
